      • findRefFrequency

        Calculates how many times each citation is cited in the paper
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        - map of citations and their frequencies

      • extractPubmedRef

        private void extractPubmedRef(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Extracts citations from the article. Citations are with ref tag . There are multiple type of citations and for this project only mixed-citations , element-citations and citations are extracted . Out of these citations only citation with pubmed id are inserted into db and rest are discarded .
        A citation is considered as pubmed citation if it has tag with pub-id-type attribute as pmid
        For each citation along with pubmed id, frequency is also inserted into database.
        Parameters:
        document -

      • extractVolume

        private void extractVolume(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Extracts volume details from the XML . Volume details are available under both journal-meta and article-meta elements. From journal-meta ,journalId , journalTitle and publisherName are extracted and from article-meta element volume and issue are extracted . There are other elements like volume-series , issue-title , issue-id which contains details about the volume , but these elements are discarded as the frequency of their occurrence is very low .
        All the above mentioned elements combinedly define a unique volume.
        Parameters:
        document - - root Element .

      • extractConference

        private void extractConference(org.w3c.dom.Element articleMeta)
        Extracts the Conference node from article-meta and traverses to its child Nodes to get conference details . Conference element is present at following locations
        . This conference element have all the required child nodes to populate conference table .
        Conference name and number is identified as a unique conference .
        Parameters:
        articleMeta - - element

      • extractKeyWords

        private void extractKeyWords(org.w3c.dom.Element articleMeta)
        • Extracts author information form the XML file .
        • Author information is available at
        • Extracted keyword is formatted and check for null and length < 200 .
        • For each keyword, keyword Id is retrieved and added to keyword reference dump

      • extractAuthor

        private void extractAuthor(org.w3c.dom.Element articleMeta)
        Extracts author information form the XML file . Author information is available at
        . For each author(GivenName + SurName) , author Id is retrieved and added to author reference dump
